attributes.action: Stop Formula 1 going to SKY Sports (& bring back cricket)
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Goverment to put a stop to this deal of losing Formula 1 to SKY Sports.

Please put a stop to this.
Just because Bernie & the BBC have sold out to all the F1 fans out there. please do not let this happen!
Come on Vince Cable - this is just up your street!
Come on Mr Cameron - do the right thing.....
